title: Reikenzan: Hoshikuzu-tachi no Utage
synopsis: Long ago in the nine provinces of Kyushu, a calamitous event was prophesied to take place: falling comets would exhaust the spiritual energies of both the heavens and the lands and thus bring about an age of chaos upon the world. But contrary to the prophecy, the comets passed by with no calamity taking place. At the same time, as if touched by the phenomenon, a boy was born in a remote village of the Sokei region by the name of Ouriku.
related_anime: ['Congqian Youzuo Lingjianshan', 'Reikenzan: Eichi e no Shikaku']
voices: ['Yonaga, Tsubasa', 'Yamaguchi, Yuriko', 'Nakamura, Eriko', 'Kobayashi, Daiki', 'Shouji, Umeka', 'Hatanaka, Marie', 'Kawada, Shinji', 'Noguchi, Yuri', 'Matsuda, Kenichirou', 'Hayashi, Daichi']
